00031 #include <stdlib.h>

00036 int allocate_output(int width, int height, TFrame *output)
00037 {
00038   int errcode;
00039   int i;
00040 
00041   errcode = 0;
00042   if(output->allocated != 1) {
00043     /* Allocate memory */
00044     output->width = width;
00045     output->height = height;
00046     output->data = (float**) malloc(sizeof(float*)*width);
00047     for(i=0;i<width;i++)
00048       output->data[i] = (float*) malloc(sizeof(float)*height);
00049 
00050     output->allocated = 1;
00051   }else {
00052     /* Check size is correct */
00053     if(output->width != width)
00054       errcode = 1;
00055     if(output->height != height)
00056       errcode = 2;
00057   }
00058   return(errcode);
00059 }
00060 
00061 /* Background frame calculation - only processes first width columns */
00062 
00063 int average_frames(TFrame **framebuffer, int nframes, TFrame *output, int width)
00064 {
00065   int height;
00066   int i, f, j;
00067   float nf, *ptr;
00068 
00069   nf = (float) nframes;
00070 
00071   height = framebuffer[0]->height;
00072 
00073   if((width > framebuffer[0]->width) || (width < 0))
00074     width = framebuffer[0]->width;
00075   
00076   if(allocate_output(width, height, output)) {
00077     return(1);
00078   }
00079  
00080   for(i=0;i<width;i++) {
00081     for(j=0;j<height;j++) {
00082       output->data[i][j] = framebuffer[0]->data[i][j];
00083     }
00084     for(f=1;f<nframes;f++) {
00085       ptr = framebuffer[f]->data[i];
00086       for(j=0;j<height;j++) {
00087         output->data[i][j] += *ptr;
00088         ptr++;
00089       }
00090     }
00091     for(j=0;j<height;j++) {
00092       output->data[i][j] /= nf;
00093     }
00094   }
00095   return(0);
00096 }
00097 
00098 int minimum_frames(TFrame **framebuffer, int nframes, TFrame *output, int width)
00099 {
00100   int height;
00101   int i, f, j;
00102   float nf, *ptr;
00103 
00104   nf = (float) nframes;
00105 
00106   height = framebuffer[0]->height;
00107 
00108   if((width > framebuffer[0]->width) || (width < 0))
00109     width = framebuffer[0]->width;
00110 
00111   if(allocate_output(width, height, output)) {
00112     return(1);
00113   }
00114   
00115   for(i=0;i<width;i++) {
00116     for(j=0;j<height;j++) {
00117       output->data[i][j] = framebuffer[0]->data[i][j];
00118     }
00119     for(f=1;f<nframes;f++) {
00120       ptr = framebuffer[f]->data[i];
00121       for(j=0;j<height;j++) {
00122         if(*ptr < output->data[i][j])
00123           output->data[i][j] = *ptr;
00124         ptr++;
00125       }
00126     }
00127   }
00128   return(0);
00129 }

00143 int subtract_background(TFrame *orig, TFrame *background, TFrame *output)
00144 {
00145   int width, height;
00146   int i, j;
00147 
00148   width = orig->width;
00149   height = orig->height;
00150   
00151   if(background->width < width)
00152     width = background->width;
00153 
00154   if(background->height < height)
00155     height = background->height;
00156 
00157   if(allocate_output(width, height, output)) {
00158     return(1);
00159   }
00160 
00161   for(i=0;i<width;i++) {
00162     for(j=0;j<height;j++) {
00163       output->data[i][j] = orig->data[i][j] - background->data[i][j];
00164     }
00165   }
00166   return(0);
00167 }

00169 /* Places frames next to each other from left to right*/
00170 int concatenate_frames(TFrame *output, int n, TFrame *first, ...)
00171 {
00172   va_list ap; /* List of arguments */
00173   int width, height;
00174   int a, i, j;
00175   TFrame *frame;
00176   int pos;
00177 
00178   if(n < 1)
00179     return(1);
00180 
00181   width = first->width;
00182   height = first->height;
00183 
00184   /* Get the size of the output frame */
00185   va_start(ap, first);
00186   for(i=1;i<n;i++) {
00187     frame = (TFrame*) va_arg(ap, TFrame*);
00188     width += frame->width;
00189     if(frame->height < height)
00190       height = frame->height;
00191   }
00192   va_end(ap);
00193 
00194   if(allocate_output(width, height, output)) {
00195     return(1);
00196   }
00197 
00198   for(i=0;i<first->width;i++) {
00199     for(j=0;j<height;j++)
00200       output->data[i][j] = first->data[i][j];
00201   }
00202   pos = first->width;
00203   
00204   va_start(ap, first);
00205   for(a=1;a<n;a++) {
00206     frame = (TFrame*) va_arg(ap, TFrame*);
00207     for(i=0;i<frame->width;i++) {
00208       for(j=0;j<height;j++)
00209         output->data[i+pos][j] = frame->data[i][j];
00210     }
00211     pos += frame->width;
00212     
00213   }
00214   va_end(ap);
00215   return(0);
00216 }
00217 
00218 /* Places frames next to each other from left to right*/
00219 int concat_frames(TFrame *output, int n, TFrame **list)
00220 {
00221   int width, height;
00222   int a, i, j;
00223   int pos;
00224 
00225   if(n < 1)
00226     return(1);
00227 
00228   width = list[0]->width;
00229   height = list[0]->height;
00230 
00231   /* Get the size of the output frame */
00232   for(i=1;i<n;i++) {
00233     width += list[i]->width;
00234     if(list[i]->height < height)
00235       height = list[i]->height;
00236   }
00237 
00238   if(allocate_output(width, height, output)) {
00239     return(1);
00240   }
00241 
00242   pos = 0;
00243   
00244   for(a=0;a<n;a++) {
00245     for(i=0;i<list[a]->width;i++) {
00246       for(j=0;j<height;j++)
00247         output->data[i+pos][j] = list[a]->data[i][j];
00248     }
00249     pos += list[a]->width;
00250     
00251   }
00252   return(0);
00253 }

00255 /* Just copy input frame to output */
00256 int copy_frame(TFrame *input, TFrame *output)
00257 {
00258   int width, height;
00259   int i, j;
00260 
00261   width = input->width;
00262   height = input->height;
00263 
00264   if(allocate_output(width, height, output)) {
00265     return(1);
00266   }
00267 
00268   for(i=0;i<width;i++) {
00269     for(j=0;j<height;j++) {
00270       output->data[i][j] = input->data[i][j];
00271     }
00272   }
00273   
00274   return(0);
00275 }
00276 
00277 /* Normalizes so that minimum is 0 and maximum is 1.0 */
00278 int normalize_frame(TFrame *input, TFrame *output)
00279 {
00280   int width, height;
00281   int i, j;
00282   float val, min, max, amp;
00283 
00284   width = input->width;
00285   height = input->height;
00286 
00287   if(allocate_output(width, height, output)) {
00288     return(1);
00289   }
00290   
00291   /* Calculate minimum and maximum */
00292   min = max = input->data[0][0];
00293   for(i=0;i<width;i++) {
00294     for(j=0;j<height;j++) {
00295       val = input->data[i][j];
00296       if(val < min)
00297         min = val;
00298       if(val > max)
00299         max = val;
00300     }
00301   }
00302   
00303   amp = 1.0 / (max - min); /* Amplification factor */
00304 
00305   for(i=0;i<width;i++) {
00306     for(j=0;j<height;j++) {
00307       output->data[i][j] = (input->data[i][j] - min) * amp;
00308     }
00309   }
00310   return(0);
00311 }
00312 
00313 /* Amplify a frame by a given amount */
00314 int amplify_frame(TFrame *input, TFrame *output, float factor)
00315 {
00316   int width, height;
00317   int i, j;
00318 
00319   width = input->width;
00320   height = input->height;
00321 
00322   if(allocate_output(width, height, output)) {
00323     return(1);
00324   }
00325 
00326   for(i=0;i<width;i++) {
00327     for(j=0;j<height;j++) {
00328       output->data[i][j] = input->data[i][j] * factor;
00329     }
00330   }
00331   return(0);
00332 }
00333 
00334 /* Applies gamma correction to a frame (relative to 1.0) */
00335 int gamma_correct_frame(TFrame *input, TFrame *output, float gamma)
00336 {
00337   int width, height;
00338   int i, j;
00339   
00340   width = input->width;
00341   height = input->height;
00342 
00343   if(allocate_output(width, height, output)) {
00344     return(1);
00345   }
00346 
00347   for(i=0;i<width;i++) {
00348     for(j=0;j<height;j++) {
00349       if(input->data[i][j] < 0.0) {
00350         output->data[i][j] = 0.0;
00351       }else {
00352         output->data[i][j] = powf(input->data[i][j], 1.0/gamma);
00353       }
00354     }
00355   }
00356   return(0);
00357 }
00358 
00359 /* Adds an offset to all the points */
00360 int offset_frame(TFrame *input, TFrame *output, float midpoint)
00361 {
00362   int width, height;
00363   int i, j;
00364   
00365   width = input->width;
00366   height = input->height;
00367 
00368   if(allocate_output(width, height, output)) {
00369     return(1);
00370   }
00371 
00372   for(i=0;i<width;i++) {
00373     for(j=0;j<height;j++) {
00374       output->data[i][j] = input->data[i][j] + midpoint;
00375     }
00376   }
00377   return(0);
00378 }

00380 /************************ SMOOTHING ALGORITHMS *******************/
00381 
00382 // Use a median filter to despeckle an image
00383 int despeckle_median(TFrame *input, TFrame *output, int radius)
00384 {
00385   int n;
00386   int width, height;
00387   int i, j, k, l, p, mid;
00388   float *vals;
00389 
00390   width = input->width;
00391   height = input->height;
00392 
00393   if((radius < 1) || (radius > width/2))
00394     radius = 1;
00395 
00396   if(allocate_output(width, height, output)) {
00397     return(1);
00398   }
00399 
00400   n = 2*radius + 1; /* Size of area */
00401   n *= n; /* Number of pixels */
00402   vals = (float*) malloc(sizeof(float)*n); /* All the values */
00403 
00404   mid = (n-1)/2; // n is always odd
00405 
00406   /* Copy boundaries */
00407   for(i=0;i!=width;i++) {
00408     for(j=0;j!=radius;j++) {
00409       output->data[i][j] = input->data[i][j];
00410       output->data[i][height-j-1] = input->data[i][height-j-1];
00411     }
00412   }
00413   for(i=0;i!=radius;i++) {
00414     for(j=0;j!=height;j++) {
00415       output->data[i][j] = input->data[i][j];
00416       output->data[width-i-1][j] = input->data[width-i-1][j];
00417     }
00418   }
00419 
00420 
00421   for(i=radius;i!=(width-radius);i++) {
00422     for(j=radius;j!=(height-radius);j++) {
00423       /* Despeckle about this point */
00424       p = 0;
00425       for(k=i-radius;k<=(i+radius);k++) {
00426         for(l=j-radius;l<=(j+radius);l++) {
00427           vals[p] = input->data[k][l];
00428           p++;
00429         }
00430       }
00431 
00432       /* Sort values */
00433       shell_sort(n, vals);
00434       
00435       output->data[i][j] = vals[mid];
00436     }
00437   }
00438 
00439   free(vals);
00440   return(0);
00441 }
00442 
00443 /* Edge-preserving filter - Kuwahara
00444    Window of width 2L + 1
00445 */
00446 int kuwahara_filter(TFrame *input, TFrame *output, int L)
00447 {
00448   int i, j, n, m;
00449   int width, height;
00450   float val, mean, sigma;
00451   float minmean, minsigma, num;
00452 
00453   width = input->width;
00454   height = input->height;
00455 
00456   if(allocate_output(width, height, output)) {
00457     return(1);
00458   }
00459 
00460   /* Set boundaries */
00461   for(i=0;i<L;i++) {
00462     for(j=0;j<L;j++) {
00463       output->data[i][j] = input->data[i][j];
00464       output->data[i][height-j-1] = input->data[i][height-j-1];
00465       output->data[width-i-1][j] = input->data[width-i-1][j];
00466       output->data[width-i-1][height-j-1] = input->data[width-i-1][height-j-1];
00467     }
00468   }
00469   
00470   num = (float) L+1;
00471   num *= num;
00472 
00473   /* Calculate filter */
00474   for(i=L;i<(width-L);i++) {
00475     for(j=L;j<(width-L);j++) {
00476       // region 1
00477       minmean = 0.0; minsigma = 0.0;
00478       for(n=-L;n<=0;n++) {
00479         for(m=0;m<=L;m++) {
00480           val = input->data[i+n][j+m];
00481           minmean += val;
00482           minsigma += val*val;
00483         }
00484       }
00485       minsigma -= minmean*minmean;
00486       
00487       // region 2
00488       mean = 0.0; sigma = 0.0;
00489       for(n=0;n<=L;n++) {
00490         for(m=0;m<=L;m++) {
00491           val = input->data[i+n][j+m];
00492           mean += val;
00493           sigma += val*val;
00494         }
00495       }
00496       sigma -= mean*mean;
00497       if(sigma < minsigma) {
00498         minmean = mean;
00499         minsigma = sigma;
00500       }
00501       
00502       // region 3
00503       mean = 0.0; sigma = 0.0;
00504       for(n=-L;n<=0;n++) {
00505         for(m=-L;m<=0;m++) {
00506           val = input->data[i+n][j+m];
00507           mean += val;
00508           sigma += val*val;
00509         }
00510       }
00511       sigma -= mean*mean;
00512       if(sigma < minsigma) {
00513         minmean = mean;
00514         minsigma = sigma;
00515       }
00516 
00517       // region 4
00518       mean = 0.0; sigma = 0.0;
00519       for(n=0;n<=L;n++) {
00520         for(m=-L;m<=0;m++) {
00521           val = input->data[i+n][j+m];
00522           mean += val;
00523           sigma += val*val;
00524         }
00525       }
00526       sigma -= mean*mean;
00527       if(sigma < minsigma) {
00528         minmean = mean;
00529         minsigma = sigma;
00530       }
00531 
00532       output->data[i][j] = minmean / num;
00533     }
00534   }
00535 
00536   return(0);
00537 }
00538 
00539 /* Try to remove pixel noise */
00540 int denoise_pixel(TFrame *input, TFrame *output, float amount)
00541 {
00542   int i, j, x, y;
00543   int width, height;
00544   float min, max;
00545 
00546   width = input->width;
00547   height = input->height;
00548 
00549   if(allocate_output(width, height, output)) {
00550     return(1);
00551   }
00552 
00553   /* Copy boundaries */
00554   for(i=0;i<width;i++) {
00555     output->data[i][0] = input->data[i][0];
00556     output->data[i][height-1] = input->data[i][height-1];
00557   }
00558   for(j=0;j<height;j++) {
00559     output->data[0][j] = input->data[0][j];
00560     output->data[width-1][j] = input->data[width-1][j];
00561   }
00562 
00563   for(i=1;i<(width-1);i++) {
00564     for(j=1;j<(height-1);j++) {
00565       /* Calculate minimum and maximum of surrounding pixels */
00566       min = input->data[i-1][j];
00567       max = min;
00568       for(x=(i-1);x<=(i+1);x++) {
00569         for(y=(j-1);y<=(j+1);y++) {
00570           if((x != i) || (y != j)) { /* Exclude central pixel */
00571             if(input->data[x][y] > max)
00572               max = input->data[x][y];
00573             if(input->data[x][y] < min)
00574               min = input->data[x][y];
00575           }
00576         }
00577       }
00578 
00579       output->data[i][j] = input->data[i][j];
00580 
00581       if(input->data[i][j] > max) {
00582         /* Central pixel is brighter than all surrounding pixels */
00583         output->data[i][j] -= amount * (input->data[i][j] - max);
00584       }
00585       if(input->data[i][j] < min) {
00586         /* pixel is dimmer than all surrounding pixels */
00587         output->data[i][j] += amount * (min - input->data[i][j]);
00588       }
00589     }
00590   }
00591   
00592   return(0);
00593 }
00594 
00595 int gauss_blur(TFrame *input, TFrame *output, float sigma)
00596 {
00597   int i, j;
00598   int width, height;
00599   int fwidth; /* Filter width */
00600   FILTER filter;
00601   float dx;
00602 
00603   width = input->width;
00604   height = input->height;
00605 
00606   if(allocate_output(width, height, output)) {
00607     return(1);
00608   }
00609   
00610   fwidth = (int) (6.0 * sigma); /* 3 sigma in each direction */
00611   if(fwidth % 2 != 0) {
00612     /* Should be even since will add another point (for middle) */
00613     fwidth += 1;
00614   }
00615   if(fwidth == 0) {
00616     fwidth = 2;
00617   }
00618   fwidth++; /* Include the centre point -> odd width */
00619 
00620   alloc_filter(&filter, fwidth, fwidth); /* a square filter */
00621 
00622   /* Set the values of the filter */
00623   for(i=0;i!=fwidth;i++) {
00624     for(j=0;j!=fwidth;j++) {
00625       dx = (float) (i - filter.x)*(i - filter.x) + (j - filter.y)*(j - filter.y);
00626       filter.weight[i][j] = expf(-0.5 * dx / (sigma*sigma)) / (2.0 * PI * sigma*sigma);
00627     }
00628   }
00629 
00630   /* Apply filter */
00631   apply_filter(input, &filter, output);
00632 
00633   /* Free the filter */
00634   free_filter(&filter);
00635 
00636   return(0);
00637 }
00638 
00639 /************************ SHARPEN ALGORITHMS *********************/
00640 
00641 int sharpen_simple(TFrame *input, TFrame *output, float k)
00642 {
00643   int i, j;
00644   int width, height;
00645 
00646   width = input->width;
00647   height = input->height;
00648 
00649   if(allocate_output(width, height, output)) {
00650     return(1);
00651   }
00652 
00653   /* Copy boundaries */
00654   for(i=0;i<width;i++) {
00655     output->data[i][0] = input->data[i][0];
00656     output->data[i][height-1] = input->data[i][height-1];
00657   }
00658   for(j=0;j<height;j++) {
00659     output->data[0][j] = input->data[0][j];
00660     output->data[width-1][j] = input->data[width-1][j];
00661   }
00662 
00663   /* Sharpen image with simple algorithm */
00664   for(i=1;i<(width-1);i++) {
00665     for(j=1;j<(height-1);j++) {
00666       output->data[i][j] = (input->data[i][j] 
00667                             - k*(input->data[i][j+1] + input->data[i][j-1] +
00668                                  input->data[i+1][j] + input->data[i-1][j])/4.0)/(1.0-k);
00669     }
00670   }
00671   return(0);
00672 }
00673 
00674 /* Unsharp masking */
00675 int sharpen_unsharp(TFrame *input, TFrame *output, float sigma, float amount)
00676 {
00677   int width, height;
00678   int i, j;
00679 
00680   width = input->width;
00681   height = input->height;
00682 
00683   /* First produce gaussian blurred frame */
00684   if(gauss_blur(input, output, sigma)) {
00685     return(0);
00686   }
00687 
00688   /* Output now contains blurred version of input */
00689 
00690   for(i=0;i<width;i++) {
00691     for(j=0;j<height;j++) {
00692       output->data[i][j] = input->data[i][j] + 
00693         amount*(input->data[i][j] - output->data[i][j]);
00694     }
00695   }
00696 
00697   return(0);
00698 }

00700 
00701 /************************ SORTING ALGORITHMS *********************/
00702 
00703 /* Shell sort */
00704 
00705 void shell_sort(unsigned long n, float *in)
00706 {
00707   unsigned long i,j,inc;
00708   float v;
00709   float *a;
00710 
00711   a = in-1;
00712 
00713   inc=1;
00714   do {
00715     inc *= 3;
00716     inc++;
00717   } while (inc <= n);
00718   do { 
00719     inc /= 3;
00720     for (i=inc+1;i<=n;i++) {
00721       v=a[i];
00722       j=i;
00723       while (a[j-inc] > v) {
00724         a[j]=a[j-inc];
00725         j -= inc;
00726         if (j <= inc) break;
00727       }
00728       a[j]=v;
00729     }
00730   } while (inc > 1);
00731 }
00732 
00733 
00734 /************************ FILTER ALGORITHMS *********************/
00735 
00736 float **float_array(int width, int height)
00737 {
00738   float **m;
00739   int i;
00740 
00741   m = (float**) malloc(sizeof(float*)*width);
00742   m[0] = (float*) malloc(sizeof(float)*width*height);
00743   
00744   for(i=1;i!=width;i++) {
00745     m[i] = m[i-1] + height;
00746   }
00747   return(m);
00748 }
00749 
00750 void free_array(float **arr)
00751 {
00752   free(arr[0]);
00753   free(arr);
00754 }
00755 
00756 void alloc_filter(FILTER *filter, int width, int height)
00757 {
00758   filter->width = width;
00759   filter->height = height;
00760   filter->x = (width-1) / 2;
00761   filter->y = (height-1) / 2;
00762   filter->normalize = 1;
00763   filter->weight = float_array(width, height);
00764 }
00765 
00766 void free_filter(FILTER *filter)
00767 {
00768   free(filter->weight[0]);
00769   free(filter->weight);
00770 }
00771 
00772 int apply_filter(TFrame *input, FILTER *filter, TFrame *output)
00773 {
00774   int i, j, x, y;
00775   int xpos, ypos;
00776   float total, val;
00777   int width, height;
00778 
00779   width = input->width;
00780   height = input->height;
00781 
00782   if(allocate_output(width, height, output)) {
00783     return(1);
00784   }
00785 
00786   for(i=0;i!=width;i++) {
00787     for(j=0;j!=height;j++) {
00788       /* Apply filter around this point */
00789 
00790       total = val = 0.0;
00791       for(x=0; x!=filter->width; x++) {
00792         for(y=0; y!=filter->height; y++) {
00793           /* Work out position to apply this weight to */
00794           xpos = i + x - filter->x;
00795           ypos = j + y - filter->y;
00796           if((xpos >= 0) && (xpos < width) &&
00797              (ypos >= 0) && (ypos < height)) {
00798             val += input->data[xpos][ypos] * filter->weight[x][y];
00799             total += filter->weight[x][y];
00800           }
00801         }
00802       }
00803       if(filter->normalize) {
00804         val /= total;
00805       }
00806       output->data[i][j] = val;
00807     }
00808   }
00809   return(0);
00810 }
